titles.title: Okusama ga Seitokaichou! Seitokaichou to Ofuro Asobi
My Wife Is the Student Council President! Student Council President and Bath Play
おくさまが生徒会長! 生徒会長とお風呂遊び

anime.description: Bundled with the limited edition of the 9th compiled volume of manga.

character.name: Misumi Rin
character.description: Misumi Rin is the head of the disciplinary committee, who dislikes http://anidb.net/ch75361 [Ui]`s love campaign. She`s somewhat hostile towards http://anidb.net/ch75357 [Hayato] as well, but later on she develops feelings for him after he treats her nicely and helps her on various occasions. She explains that she joined the committee because she wanted to disclaim a rumor that she was seducing guys with her large chest by emphasizing her morally pure side. Source: Wikipedia, edited.

character.name: Izumi Hayato
character.description: Izumi Hayato is a fairly serious individual who is the vice-president of the student council. He is set up with http://anidb.net/ch75361 [Wakana Ui] in an arranged marriage and must live with her in his apartment. Despite his ever-growing respect for Ui throughout the series, he often gets caught in her romantic advances which make him uncomfortable yet aroused. Hayato is notably self-sufficient, having cooked and cleaned for himself prior to Ui`s arrival. Source: Wikipedia, edited.

character.name: Niikura Ayane
character.description: Niikura Ayane is the student council secretary. She likes to dress up in frilly outfits and cat ears. She is a bit spacey and absent-minded. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Sawatari Makoto
character.description: Sawatari Makoto is a member of the disciplinary committee, working under http://anidb.net/ch75356 [Misumi Rin]. She looks after Rin like http://anidb.net/ch75362 [Karen] does with http://anidb.net/ch75361 [Ui]. Makoto also has a collection of pictures of Rin in embarrassing situations. Source: Wikipedia, edited.

character.name: Wakana Ui
character.description: The newly-elected student council president, elected on a platform of "liberalising love" in the school. Her parents and Izumi Hayato`s parents arranged their marriage.

character.name: Fujisaki Karen
character.description: Fujisaki Karen is the student council treasurer. She is petite and is extremely devoted to http://anidb.net/ch75362 [Ui], harboring a perverted interest in her. She dislikes http://anidb.net/ch75357 [Hayato] and often comes in conflict with him. Source: Wikipedia, edited.

character.name: Misumi Kei
character.description: Misumi Kei is http://anidb.net/ch75356 [Rin]`s elder sister, and the school nurse. She likes to wear sexy clothing, much to Rin`s annoyance. She lives in the unit next to http://anidb.net/ch75361 [Ui] and http://anidb.net/ch75357 [Hayato]`s.

episode.title: Wife Theater
Okusama Gekijou
episode.summary: Seven short comedy specials from the DVD of the Okusama ga Seitokaichou! OAD
